TopicTitle: [Solved]Help with exporting my model to unity, then to KSP....

Articles.Content:
hey if anyone could give me a hand on skype in exporting my model to ksp that would be the best! Cheers

Edited September 20, 2014 by strykersm
You might have a better chance by posting in the modding subforum.
I can't , its blocked for me for some reason.... can you get on a teamspeak or on skype? :\
follow Nifty255's video. it shows very clearly the exact steps you need to do to get a part into the game.

follow Nifty255's video. it shows very clearly the exact steps you need to do to get a part into the game.

Please smack me in the face nli, i didn't watch the part where he told me to download older versions of blender.....thanks m8! "More hours of video watching yay!"
heh, I did the same thing first time, skipped a critical part of the video. also stick with FBX for exports from blender. his video shows the FBX export settings you should use.

heh, I did the same thing first time, skipped a critical part of the video. also stick with FBX for exports from blender. his video shows the FBX export settings you should use.

Yeah, im working on that now! But imma leave it for tomorrow, i'm sick now, but hell....for respect of the 109 imma try and finish this even sooner, i just need to fix the materials, i had 3 so the windows of the cockpit (which had 1 of those 3) got all messy so i had to re-do it in sketchup to remove all materials. No i need to drag the textures back in place. As soon as i see its fixed and properly working, i'l post a download link. Then i'l start working the IVA.

God i feel like a modder xD First mod ever for every game and its becoming a win!
